scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible customer churn prediction model deployed by a financial institution.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to infer protected attributes like income and credit score, violating customer privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of a publicly available customer churn prediction model.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A publicly accessible API for a customer churn prediction model is exploited.
